moan for 10 seconds.
Put on a blindfold and touch the other player’s faces and try to guess who it is, if you get a perfect score, youre safe, otherwise, take a shot
do an improv comedy routine until two people laugh
pick a number from 1-60, open the dares.txt file and do that number dare. No skipping or passing after you pick the number.
Share a memorable intimate experience in vivid detail with the group.
You have to keep your hand on the very inner thigh of a random player till your name or their name is called.
Stand on one leg for 2 minutes. Every time you fail remove an article of clothing, timer resumes when you get back on one leg 
share your most embarassing sexual encounter in vivid detail
Give a heartfelt speech about a random object in the room for 2 minutes.
get slapped by a random player
use your worst pick up line on a random player
GROUP DARE !!!! TAKE A SHOT AND PLAY JENGA !!!! who ever knocks down the tower has to streak from one heights house to the other or vice versa !!!! (press pass, and then press group skip to tally the shots)
Hold a random player’s hand until your name is called again
Take a shower
Give a player of your choice a piggyback ride and walk around the house.
put an ice cube down your pants and let it melt.
stay silent for the next ten minutes (coughing, sneezing, etc. is okay, but laughing is not) every word spoken is a item of clothing removed
spank a random person (with their consent).
Boil an egg until it's soft boiled, Sahil will check it, and if it's over or undercooked, take a full shot. 
Eat a spoon of mayo.
Eat a raw egg.
Switch clothes with someone random in the group, don't swap underwear (gross).
Piss your pants right now.
Wear your clothes inside out for the rest of the game.
Go into the other room, take your clothes off and put them on backwards for the rest of the game.
bite the neck of the player with the least shots taken
go commando for the rest of the game
tell us how you are feeling emotionally and mentally and tell us how you're doing.
For the rest of the game, do not say "I." every time you do, take off one article of clothing. (the group has to remain vigilant)
GROUP DARE !!!! TAKE A SHOT AND HAVE A PILLOW FIGHT!!!! (press pass, and then press group skip to tally the shots)
Run around the house outside once in your underwear.
Show everyone your search history for the past week.
kiss a random player on the cheek or forehead
Handcuff yourself to a table until your name is picked again.
Get into the shower with your clothes on. Towel will be provided. 
handcuff yourself to a random for until your name is called twice, all dares and truths must be completed while handcuffed.
make the rest of the group a hot meal, using whatever ingredients you can find. the group will rate your meal from 1-10 and if your average is below 5 you have to take a shot.
